recommendations.title: The Matrix
recommendations.description: A hacker discovers the world is a simulated reality and joins a rebellion to free humanity.

recommendations.title: Interstellar
recommendations.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

recommendations.title: The Dark Knight
recommendations.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.

recommendations.title: The Shawshank Redemption
recommendations.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

recommendations.title: The Godfather
recommendations.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
